extendedInfo.description: Can you identify the US Presidents? Do you know all what years they were in office? Test your knowledge of the US Presidents in Know Your Presidents. A great quiz game for all ages. Learn about the Presidents as you play. Keep Score on how well you know the Presidents.Choose from 2 different categories:* Try to associate a picture of the President with their name.* Try to associate the President with the years they were in office.You can choose from 3 different game types: * Choose the correct President from 4 different pictures.* Choose the correct President clue from the picture.* Flashcards - View different pictures of President to help you learn the US Presidents.The score is based on the number of questions, the percent answered correct, and the time it takes to complete the quiz.Keywords: Quiz, Test, Trivia, School, Learn, Learning, United States, USA, Scoreloop, Game, Flashcards, Presidents, George Washington, Abraham Lincoln, Obama, Election, Romney, Republican, Democrat, Whig

reviews.title: Neat app
reviews.comment: Very helpful for those wanting to memorize the Presidents, whether they\'re students or just trivia buffs.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Good game for kids to learn about all president\'s
reviews.author: A Google User
